title: Casey Crescenzo from The Dear Hunter
itunes:title: Casey Crescenzo from The Dear Hunter
description:
Today we have Casey Crescenzo from The Dear Hunter on the program. He's an incredibly prolific and compelling musician that has spent a majority of his life involved in independent music not only in this band but also with his previous band, The Receiving End of Sirens. We get deep into our mutual appreciation for nu-metal, ambition and his early touring life. A must listen!
